item.title: Flight Deck First Observer’s Seat (Including Associated Equipment) – First Observer’s Audio Selector Panel

numlitem.para: Occupant of seat is not required to perform official duties,
An FAA Inspector may, after being briefed on the nature of the discrepancy, elect to utilize the seat,
Acceptable communications procedures are established and used, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

note.para: An official observer may elect to use the cockpit speaker if the Audio Selector Panel/Headset is inoperative and such procedure is acceptable to the flight crew.

placard.para: Placard First Observer's Audio Selector Panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
